attributes.action: Stop giving chemo to patients and profiting Drug company's use canabis oils.
attributes.additional_details: Cannabis use for medicinal purposes dates back at least 3,000 years. It was introduced into Western medicine in the 1840s by W.B. O’Shaughnessy, a surgeon who learned of its medicinal properties while working in India for the British East Indies Company. Its use was promoted for reported analgesic, sedative, anti-inflammatory, antispasmodic, and anticonvulsant effects. Used in clinical use around the world.
attributes.background: Cannabinoids have benefits in the treatment of cancer-related side effects cures 95% of people who have used the product. We all no the cancer industry is billions and chemotherapy just kills people five times as quick and doesn't cure anybody. Little kids and adults have been cured of canabis oils.
